snippet.title: Title: Historical building stability monitoring by means of a cosmic ray tracking system
snippet.description:

Barnabà (3 and 2), F. Fallavollita (3 and 2), R. Nardò (3 and 2), C. Riccardi (3 and 2), M. Rossella (3 and 2), P. Vitulo (3 and 2), G. Zumerle (4) ((1) Università di Brescia, Italy, (2) Istituto Nazionale di Fisica Nucleare, Italy, (3) Università di Pavia, Italy, (4) Università di Padova, Italy)
Comments: 32 pages, 16 figures
Subjects: Instrumentation and Detectors (physics.ins-det); Instrumentation and Methods for Astrophysics (astro-ph.IM); Physics and Society (physics.soc-ph)

snippet.title: Title: Strong seismic motions estimated from a one direction-three components ("1d-3c") approach, application to the city of rome, italy

Title: Strong seismic motions estimated from a one direction-three components ("1d-3c") approach, application to the city of rome, italy

Comments: 5th International Conference on Earthquake Geotechnical Engineering, Chile (2011)
Subjects: Geophysics (physics.geo-ph)

snippet.title: Title: The dynamical gluon mass in the massless bound-state formalism
snippet.description:
Title: The dynamical gluon mass in the massless bound-state formalism
Authors: David Ibanez
Comments: 12 pages, 8 figures. Talk presented at the QCD-TNT-III-From quarks and gluons to hadronic matter: A bridge too far? 2-6 September, 2013 - ECT* Trento, Italy
Subjects: High Energy Physics - Phenomenology (hep-ph); High Energy Physics - Lattice (hep-lat); High Energy Physics - Theory (hep-th)

snippet.title: Title: The Astrophysics of the Intracluster Plasma
snippet.description:
Title: The Astrophysics of the Intracluster Plasma
Authors: A. Cavaliere (1,2), A. Lapi (1,3) (1-Univ. 'Tor Vergata', Rome, Italy, 2-INAF/OAR, Rome, Italy, 3-SISSA, Trieste, Italy)
Comments: 62 pages, 13 figures, 1 table. Accepted by Physics Reports
Subjects: Cosmology and Nongalactic Astrophysics (astro-ph.CO)

snippet.title: Title: Steepest-Entropy-Ascent and Maximal-Entropy-Production Dynamical Models of Irreversible Relaxation to Stable Equilibrium from Any Non-Equilibrium State. Unified Treatment for Six Non-Equilibrium Frameworks
snippet.description:
Title: Steepest-Entropy-Ascent and Maximal-Entropy-Production Dynamical Models of Irreversible Relaxation to Stable Equilibrium from Any Non-Equilibrium State. Unified Treatment for Six Non-Equilibrium Frameworks
Authors: Gian Paolo Beretta
Comments: JETC2013, Brescia, Italy, July 1-5, 2013. The six frameworks are: A) Classical Statistical Mechanics; B) Small-Scale and Rarefied Gases Dynamics; C) Statistical or Information Theory; D) Rational Extended Thermodynamics, Macroscopic Non-Equilibrium Thermodynamics, Chemical Kinetics; E) Mesoscopic Irreversible Thermodynamics; F) Quantum Statistical Mechanics, Quantum Thermodynamics
Journal-ref: Proceedings of the 12th Joint European Thermodynamics Conference, JETC 2013, Eds. M. Pilotelli and G.P. Beretta (ISBN 978-88-89252-22-2, Snoopy, Brescia, Italy, 2013), pp. 100-109
Subjects: Statistical Mechanics (cond-mat.stat-mech); Classical Physics (physics.class-ph)

snippet.title: Title: Euclidian crystals in many-body systems: breakdown of Goldstone's theorem
snippet.description:
Title: Euclidian crystals in many-body systems: breakdown of Goldstone's theorem
Authors: Sergei I. Mukhin
Comments: 12 pages, 0 figures, Stripes 2013 Ischia, Italy, May 27-June 1
Subjects: Strongly Correlated Electrons (cond-mat.str-el)

snippet.title: Title: Cosmic-ray propagation in molecular clouds
snippet.description:
Title: Cosmic-ray propagation in molecular clouds
Authors: Marco Padovani (1), Daniele Galli (2) ((1) Laboratoire de Radioastronomie Millimétrique, École Normale Supérieure et Observatoire de Paris, France, (2) INAF-Osservatorio Astrofisico di Arcetri, Italy)
Comments: To appear in "Cosmic Rays in Star-Forming Environments", Proceedings of the 2nd Session of the Sant Cugat Forum on Astrophysics. D. F. Torres and O. Reimer (Editors), 2013, Springer, 25 pages, 11 figures
Subjects: Astrophysics of Galaxies (astro-ph.GA)
